meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>black</kanji> <kanji>fog</kanji> is going to be a really <vocabulary>thick fog</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>black veil</vocabulary> that covers suspicious acts or crimes. It's not a literal cloud of fog or a physical veil, it's what you hide your bad deeds in, metaphorically speaking.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 黒い and 霧.
